meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of an icon.
meanings.sent1: The iconic statue stood tall in the park.
meanings.sent2: The iconic building is a famous landmark in the city.
meanings.sent3: The iconic painting seemed to wink at me from the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as iconic as the Mona Lisa's.
meanings.sent5: The iconic logo was instantly recognizable to everyone.

meanings.sent1: The iconic singer's songs are loved by many.
meanings.sent2: The iconic brand has been around for decades.
meanings.sent3: The iconic movie star tripped over his own feet on the red carpet.
meanings.sent4: Her iconic status in the fashion world was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The iconic landmark attracted tourists from all over the world.
